title: Dota

title: Elon Musk
content: I'm convinced if Steve Jobs was an engineer, he'd be Elon Musk.  Tesla and SpaceX are startups that are doing things massive legacy companies thought were too difficult, too expensive, or not profitable enough.  Profit doesn't drive his decisions as much as the benefit to society.  This country was built on around helping your fellow man.  As a country we've gotten away from that, but Elon Musk is great example of what we can achieve without putting profits above all.
